  • Radios

Example :: Radios

Code Samples

The Publishers

These radio buttons control the paragraphs below. Click them and see the subscribers react.
The radio buttons will publish a single event with a single value. It is the subsribers who listen for the event and the values that will make them show / hide.


<!-- Publishers -->
<div class="pd-delegate-hook">
  <label>
    <input type="radio" name="radios" class="pd-publisher"
      data-pd-publish-events="/radio/events/" value="radio.attr.val1" /> radio.attr.val1
  </label>

  <label>
    <input type="radio" name="radios" class="pd-publisher"
      data-pd-publish-events="/radio/events/" value="radio.attr.val2" /> radio.attr.val2
  </label>
</div>

The Subscibers

These sections are shown by default. Simply becuase there is no hidden style applied.

Section 1
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Libero nobis accusamus corporis, repellendus esse possimus numquam est deleniti vero laudantium in, facilis nisi ratione beatae, nostrum reprehenderit labore tempore? Quam!
Section 2
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Libero nobis accusamus corporis, repellendus esse possimus numquam est deleniti vero laudantium in, facilis nisi ratione beatae, nostrum reprehenderit labore tempore? Quam!
Section 3
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Libero nobis accusamus corporis, repellendus esse possimus numquam est deleniti vero laudantium in, facilis nisi ratione beatae, nostrum reprehenderit labore tempore? Quam!
Section 4
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Libero nobis accusamus corporis, repellendus esse possimus numquam est deleniti vero laudantium in, facilis nisi ratione beatae, nostrum reprehenderit labore tempore? Quam! 

<!-- Subscribers -->
<div class="pd-subscriber"
        data-pd-subscribe-events="/radio/events/"
        data-pd-subscribe-values="radio.attr.val1">
  ...Single event, single value
</div>

<div class="pd-subscriber"
        data-pd-subscribe-events="/radio/events/"
        data-pd-subscribe-values="radio.attr.val2|radio.attr.val3">
  ...Single event, multiple values
</div>
